<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.JiraIntegrationRESTUtils</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>JiraIntegrationRESTUtils</name> <script><![CDATA[var JiraIntegrationRESTUtils = Class.create(); JiraIntegrationRESTUtils.prototype = { initialize: function() { var client_id = 'IiwDK7YV9X3cy73caoasttj9a5wTc8WK'; var client_secret ='ATOAtc_8GBMQRGJ2GF6oK76YevmxG4BOWaICUPrWtvt2k4fdffAxtjGEf__EeI7pv7th65B57C3F'; var oauthProfile = new GlideQuery('oauth_entity_profile') .where('name', 'Google OAuth 2.0 Demo V2 default_profile') .selectOne() .get(); var oauthRequest = new GlideQuery('oauth_requestor_profile') .where('oauth_entity_profile', oauthProfile.sys_id) .where('requestor_context', 'sys_rest_message'); // get request id of request for sys_rest_message this.credentials = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClient().getToken(oauthRequest.request_id, oauthProfile.sys_id); },
type: 'JiraIntegrationRESTUtils' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-11-18 14:38:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>024310382f131110d8a4d5f62799b697</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>JiraIntegrationRESTUtils</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_024310382f131110d8a4d5f62799b697</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-18 15:35:44</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>814</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
